enb_long_title: SIXTH CONFERENCE OF THE PARTIES TO THE UN FRAMEWORK CONVENTION ON CLIMATE CHANGE RESUMED SESSION
sentences: At 12:30 am Monday, 23 July, President Pronk reconvened the Group.
He reported that he had not produced a new text because he believed an agreement remained possible on his 'core elements' proposal.
He said that although ongoing consultations had managed to address some Parties' concerns, not all problems had been cleared up.
Suggesting that Groups' overriding remaining concerns related to the compliance section, he said further consultations would be held on that section only.
He suggested that if delegates could not reach agreement, he would bring the text back for adoption in Plenary as it stood.
